ICH BIN REIIIIIIIICH! MIT CS HAB ICH 15,99 gewonnen in 3 Jahren!! Wenn du wissen willst wie ich es geschafft habe dann schreib HIER drunter "ICH WILL ES" und ich zeige dir wie man soooo erfolgreich wird so wie IIIIIIICHH!!!

I started playing this game when I started to get depressed IRL.
I made a lot of friends and got to know that I was actually a likeable human being.
People seemed to be happy and excited to play with me.
I called them friends and they helped me simply by existing and being happy with me.
I grew confident, learnt I was actually a bit fun to talk with.
This game made me discover myself and I forever will be thankful for that.
The thing that makes this game what it is are the people, you'll meet a LOT of them it's upto you to choose who to keep playing with and who to forget and forgive.
The people i met through this game are some of my lifelong friends and I am lucky to have those friends.
I may not play this game everyday now but this game holds a dear and special place in my heart.
este juego es muy bueno tiene buenos graficos se puede jugar bien tiene suficientes modos de juego loq ue mas me gusta en el gun game tiene bastantes armas y fue uno de los mejor CS que conosi
